document.full_text: heavy clashes broke out on monday in the town of duekoue, in western ivory coast, between forces loyal to incumbent laurent gbagbo and his rival in an election dispute, residents and combatants said.
document.title: fighting between erupts in strategic ivory coast town
lines_and_colors: heavy clashes broke out on monday in the town of duekoue, in western ivory coast, between forces loyal to incumbent laurent gbagbo and his rival in an election dispute, residents and combatants said.
